news.title: Boeing stems cash burn for first time since 2023 but takes $4.9 billion charge on 777X delays
news.summary: Boeing reports third-quarter results before the market opens on Wednesday. Boeing is the largest U.S. aircraft manufacturer. The company has more than 100,000 employees worldwide.

news.title: Nvidia shares pop 3% in premarket as tech giant nears historic $5 trillion valuation
news.summary: AI-fueled market rally has prompted some to raise the alarm on fears of a bubble. A dizzying AI-Fueled Market Rally has Prompted Some to Raise the Alarm on Fears of a Bubble.

news.title: Etsy stock sinks on mixed earnings, CEO change — growth chief to replace Silverman
news.summary: Etsy said Josh Silverman will step down as CEO and be replaced by chief growth officer Kruti Patel Goyal. Etsy is a maker of Etsy, an Etsy-owned Etsy store.

news.title: The Fed is expected to approve another rate cut Wednesday. Here's what else to expect
news.summary: The easy part for the Federal Reserve this week will be announcing a rate cut when it wraps up its meeting Wednesday. The Federal Reserve will announce a rate cutting when it ends its meeting on Wednesday.

news.title: Character.AI to block romantic AI chats for minors a year after teen's suicide
news.summary: Character.AI said it will phase out open-ended chats for minors, including romantic dialogues with AI chatbots, by Nov. 25.

news.title: I’m 53, a single parent with a $1 million home. My boyfriend wants to marry. Am I better off staying single?
news.summary: “Should I just maintain the status quo or marry the love of my life?” she asks herself. “ should I just stay the same?’ she asks.

news.title: Fiserv’s stock slides toward worst day ever as outlook reset is called ‘difficult to comprehend’
news.summary: The company, which sells payment processing, mobile banking and billing solutions to banks and merchants, dramatically lowered its guidance for the year. The company is based in New York and has more than 100,000 employees.

news.title: All five of his hedge funds have doubled this year. What this manager is saying now about gold and tech.
news.summary: Crescat's five funds have soared in value through the end of September. The firm that's bullish on gold hasn't been deterred by a recent slide in the yellow metal.

news.title: Apple earnings need to resolve this major investor question
news.summary: Apple’s iPhone business exceeded expectations in the June quarter. Early iPhone 17 indications have been encouraging. But is that demand sustainable? We asked.

news.title: Nvidia could become the first $5 trillion company today. Here’s just how big that is.
news.summary: A $5 trillion market capitalization would be larger than the combined market values of Broadcom, TSMC, AMD, ASML, Micron, Lam Research and Qualcomm.
